website_summaries.verdict: First responders need a portable and highly visible carrier for their equipment, and the Ever Ready First Responder kit definitely provides that. Some users may need to fill out the initial kit with additional supplies specific to their needs.
pros: Highly visible orange bag contains bandages, ointments, medical equipment and emergency rescue supplies
Compartments keep items organized and protected
Rubberized bottom layer holds kit in place
cons: Contents found in bag may not match contents listed in advertising
Different sellers include different medical supplies, so some additional products may need to be purchased later
Some items listed as multiples may only be a single

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bandages and things you'd find in basic first aid kit. I wonder why they put hard oral airways in it, but no ambu bag or laryngiscope? Seems if you don't know how to use those things, you shouldn't try LOL. You will definitely want to add a tourniquet, some more glucose, a couple SAM splints and more (better) gloves. There is plenty of space in the bag to make your own additions. Overall it's a great starter kit
customer_reviews.author: Abby512

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my significant other, he is an EMR. The bag is thin but is sturdy, the double zippers are nice quality, it has little feet on the bottom. It is very roomy bag, it fits all that comes with it plus room for more. It is approximately 14 lbs with the stuff that comes with it plus the add ins- peroxide, alcohol, C-collars, Digital BP cuff and more bandaids. The stethoscope and manual BP cuff aren't the greatest quality, but still work in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag! - Photos
customer_reviews.text: I am and EMT in SoCal. This is an Excellent Med bag to build off of. It has more space than you expect, and definitely leaves room for other Items. The stock that comes with the bag is acceptional for the price, however, you will need to purchase more supplies to have an adequate and efficient "Trauma Bag". I would recommend to line the bag with a dense material on the bottom and the sides, such as "heavy duty" Ramboard or cardboard. Right out of the box, it is a bit "flimsy", but as you build up your supplies You will begin to see the bag take a more firm shape. Overall, I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: this is a great starting kit
customer_reviews.text: this is a great starting kit. just like any other kit, you will have to customize it to your needs. i feel like the size of the bag is bigger than the description shows, I measured the bag and it was 23x13x9, its bigger than i expected which is fine. there is lots of room to add more items to the kit. it also came with an inner foam divider as seen in my pictures i have added items to the kit for my needs, so not everything that you see in my pictures will come with the kit, but a majority of the items do come with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Watched a few videos of other people buying this. From those, i figured I'd check it out, and see for myself. I was not wrong. This is a great kit and work every sent you pay for. I truly think they should charge more for these. For everything that comes inside. It's a must for anyone and everyone! Thinking about buying my third, for a nice stocked home first aid, and trauma kit.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: First aid kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit was fully stocked as described.I did how ever have to aquire a few things from my local walgreens to complete the kit for my needs like sanitary wound cleaner and extra gloves along with a c-collar and ambo bag to complete the kit.I think for the money this was a bang for the bucks.my total after the few addons was about $160.00
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Kuenzinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and has come in handy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit to keep in my car along with my CERT gear. I have added to it with extra gauze, bandages, gloves, etc. as a kit for large disasters to be able to help as many people as possible. I have used this kit on two accident scenes where EMS were not on scene yet. It has come in very handy. There are a couple pieces that may not be appropriate for non-EMS people, but for the most part it is a great pack!
customer_reviews.author: Tweetyfern

customer_reviews.title: sturdy bag. Basics are provided with lots of room ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days! Roomy, sturdy bag. Basics are provided with lots of room to add more. Good quality supplies. I'd buy it again and suggest it to others. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: It's a great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The BLS kit comes with the basics. It's a great price for what you get. The biggest complaint I have is every single kit I have purchased the shoulder straps beak off and the bags start to tear in the seams. They don't hold up to constant use. This is a great kit to just throw in the back of your car for the occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Response bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing First Aid Kit. Lots of space for lots of extras. I keep mine near by all the time. It can be a real life saver. I have stocked mine with everything a person could need in a traumatic situation. It comes with a lot of good things but to cover it all you will need to add more but this bag has the space for it. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Be safe not sorry.
customer_reviews.text: If something happens, you I’ll be glad you have this.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Starter kit!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a solid foundation to have for a home trauma kit. It has most things you could need and room for everything else you could want. I got this packed to brim and have full confidence that the bag will handle the general wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: bcekli

customer_reviews.title: An Aid Bag for all purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "aid bag". Well stocked, with quality components. Of course, most of us will want to add a few things for our particular circumstances, but there's lots of room for extras. I use this when providing volunteer medical support for events such as bike races and marathons, but it would be equally useful for paramedics and other first responders.
customer_reviews.author: CVW

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep in your trunk
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member who's on the first aid squad and they said it had everything they needed in it.
customer_reviews.author: anita dill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick preparedness.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, everything you need and more to be prepared. Durable and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Tossled Tails, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful first aid kit
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful first aid kit. A must for when ever it needed has everything important. Still has plenty of room to add to the bag. Good quality of products. Definite keeper !
customer_reviews.author: kathy brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son-in-law who is a Paramedic. He had been asking for a new jump bag. I found this at a great price and free delivery. Ordering was easy and it was delivered 2 days early which was amazing because it was a week before Christmas. My son-in-law was so excited because it has everything and more, plus all the different pockets and dividers inside. It was definitely a big hit at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is good quality and comes with a lot of stuff. The items inside appear to be of good quality too. Has dividers inside so you can separate things. I added other things to make the kit what I wanted it to be. All in all this is a very good bag full of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the orange bag with the star of life on it as shown on the site. When I received it, it was not as it was shown. I contacted the company and they went above and beyond what would normally be done by most companies to correct the problem. The bag is of good quality and I would recommend it for basic EMT students or first responders. For the money, it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: CEP

customer_reviews.title: A must for every home
customer_reviews.text: Superb. Really well made, love all the compartments. Supplies it came with would have been so much more expensive singly. Not that I want to have to use it but now I am prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much what I expected. It is ready to go for most minor to medium trauma patients, including a seat belt cutter (a plus) and a flexible mouth-to-mouth mask to protect the rescuer from having to actually touch the patient's mouth & nose (a plus). However, it seems to be a bit short on some supplies: not enough Kling-type wraps, only one abdominal sized bandage and no sterile water or saline. Obviously, those are inexpensive items but seems like they would have been included. Plus, instead of wood or solid splints, it contained only one (I think) flexible splint. Overall, it is a good starter bag that hopefully I'll never need.
customer_reviews.author: Morris M.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: We are still in awe - I ordered this item at 200pmEST on Wednesday and it arrived by 4:00pmEST on Thursday - WOW and it is very large spacious, it comes with plenty of items and there is room for more ....so very worth it .....compare it to Red Cross items this is a steal...
customer_reviews.author: renee trivisonno

customer_reviews.title: Great first responder bag I would recommend this to anybody ...
customer_reviews.text: Great first responder bag I would recommend this to anybody in the field. For anyone that carries a weapon great for the truck or car camping trips or even at home very satisfied thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I used this bag only once and the very first ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag only once and the very first day the material of the bag began to unraveled at the seam leaving a large hole/ tear in the seam. Now it has no use, I regret making the purchases .
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to keep in my van for emergencies. This kit has everything I could possibly need. The bag itself is well made with heavy-duty zippers and the color is extremely bright. The contents alone are worth nearly double the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hansing

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Items for Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to incorporate in our family's hurricane emergency kit. Great starter bag, We only need to add a few more items to personalize for each member, but overall this is a very good start.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Ahh. The bag is OK
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh. An Alright Kit, but cheep bag. Lightweight and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Tom Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for in car first aid kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit after completing my first aid training. It is more comprehensive than any first aid kit that you will find in drugstores. I used it a number of times when volunteering at school activities.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stats

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice big bag that we use for camping
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice big bag that we use for camping. It comes with everything and then some that you could need. Enough room to add other items as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching around and found this same bag without the supplies for $200 retail. This is certainly a great buy! Not only is the bag sturdy, it's lightweight. I needed the bag sooner than the estimated delivery time of 5-7 days. I made a phone call to the seller, left a message and two days later I had the bag with supplies on my doorstep. The supplies are great, I only need to add a BVM and few extra gloves. With a little bit of organization, I now have a fully stocked EMT bag ready to use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag had so much in it I only ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag had so much in it I only added more gloves an some alcohol wips an plan of getting some of the barf bags to put in there as well
customer_reviews.author: Catherine butler

customer_reviews.title: A lot bigger than i had originally thought, with ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than i had originally thought, with the lack of items in the bag i definitely could see the price being cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: harrison K

customer_reviews.title: Returned it - even though I had to pay return postage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit to use in a Coast Guard Auxilliary vessel. It arrived poorly packaged (bag unzipped and contents all together in plastic bag). Various items described on the Amazon site were missing (forceps, wire splint tourniquet, CPR Mask) however there was no included inventory list to determine what was actually meant to be included. Definitely a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo Jim

customer_reviews.title: great kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great start off point to building a first responder bag. It includes many items some of which you would never think of. Great to add on to. It is a fairly sturdy bag. Wouldnt recommend throwing it around but I take it everywhere and its holding up great. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing a first responder/ good first aid kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: i just got this a few days ago. It came in with a lot of items already. But I still have a lot of room for other supplies depending on your needs. Great item to have at work or at home and even when you go out camping and such. Better to have it and not need it. Maybe I'll even put a defib in the bag one day. Hahaha. And the Bag seems really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Medic911

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how nice this was when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how nice this was when it arrived. Had reflective material on the outside along with medical insignia. Everything was sealed up and packaged great. I was surprised at just how much was inside and how many compartments it has. Well made. Being an EMT this is nice to keep in my car
customer_reviews.author: Sassychacha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to carry along on any trip. Be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: ttoth

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love the first aid bag and I will definitely recommend this to all my friends and family. It will take more to fill it but it's good buy
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Steve
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Trauma bag - fast shipping came just as it showed in the picture with everything packaged and new I'm very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Terrific deal
customer_reviews.text: Price these around. I cannot seem to find a more well equipped kit even close to this price, Ill be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter bag for my husband. He works sporting events and has it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna S.

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is freaking huge. Kind of empty-ish, plenty of room to add more items to this "Fully Stocked" kit I guess. I'm not overly impressed but not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Easley

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the best deal i've seen online! it comes with practically everything you would need in an emergency situation (bandages, wire splints, bp cuff, OPA's etc). The bag itself is "customizable" with velcro sectionals so you can organize it however you want. There is plenty of extra room for other stuff you may want to pick up that doesn't come with the bag like a c-collar or a box of gloves. it's an awesome deal for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: EMSstudent

customer_reviews.title: Trauma Kit
customer_reviews.text: You would think a Trauma Kit would also have items to aid in a greater range of situation, as this one limits this process.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter
customer_reviews.text: Has a load of stuff and room to add all your own and then some. I would recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SheepDad

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: From the description I thought it had a lot more stuff in it. It is for our Church and I had already told them about it ... so it made me look kinda stupid. I haven't gotten up the nerve to take it to the Church yet. I thought about getting some more things to put in it out of my own money first.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I found the orange backpack to be very flimsy. The package was stored in the trunk of my car, and it tore along the zipper compartments while in the trunk. I will need to replace the orange packaging
customer_reviews.author: DrDebit

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bag was exactly what I wanted. Not too large, yet big enough to hold what I need. The price with it's bandages was very reasonable compared to other bags out there. I'll finish filling it with other first aid supplies that fit my needs. It was very slow getting here, I took off one star for the shipping. Expect about two weeks!
customer_reviews.author: movie buff

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment crappy bag. All the essentials to start a much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. All the essentials to start a much larger kit. The bag is mostly empty and has a ton of room on the sides and inside for additional equipment. The Equipment included in the bag was pretty great. Ton's of essential medical supplies. My problem here is the bag in which it was provided. It sure looks like a sturdy bag in the pictures. In reality it ripped apart during it's first use and all medical supplies had to be transferred to another bag. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: L4nner

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This bag was not worth the purchase price. Yes, the bag is sturdy. But it also states it's fully stocked. It came with a stethescope, a sphygmomanometer, two slings, a cpr shield, some bandages and some bandaids. There was no where near what other users had posted and I had to spend another $200 to fill it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter bag. needs a few more things such as,O.B kit and Ambu-bag. But nicely stocked for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Scott  MacHsrrie NREMT

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quick shippping and everything I need for an emergency. I've jsut started my EMT classes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Trauma Bag.. Lots of Space.. Perfect for EMR's, not for constant use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful trauma bag.. it has tons of space and comes with a good amount of supplies. (Does not include nasopharangeal airways, and only comes with a couple pair of medium sized gloves) Getting more detailed this bag is perfect for EMR's to keep in their vehicle, or for working at sporting events. However the bag is not for constant use. The bag seems to have cheap construction. If this bag is used on a daily basis I believe it will deteriorate quickly. Because if this I could not suggest this bag for law enforement use. The bag (once full) is about 2.5 x 1.5 x 1 feet. The picture doesn't do it justice. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great for First Responders
customer_reviews.text: This bag contains many of the medical supplies one learns to use in his EMR class. The equipment and bag are are high quality and well-packaged. I bought this to put in my car in case of emergencies and added a few things like gloves and face masks to have all I need! I highly recommend it to any other first responders. It really is a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: too much too little
customer_reviews.text: the kit is nice & the bag is very ergonomic. some supplies they offer are great while other things you need are lacking. you're covered from everything, but the most common stuff that you need the most are bandages, antiseptic, eye wash, & maybe some aspirin/ibuprofen. Those things are lacking in volume, they give you some, but not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bag was amazing had to add some stuff to it but it has everything it says. It is also alot bigger than you may think
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: wheres my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where you good people got your bag from, but I could have got all this at Wal-Mart for a hole lot less.it came with only part of the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: The bag has great storage and bright orange so you can't miss it in emergency situation. fully customizable compartments so everything has a place.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Decent but doesnt cut it
customer_reviews.text: Though there are many items in the bag, it is geared more towards first aid instead of Trauma. The bag is very low quality and the price is a bit to high. You could have made this kit for half the products. This bag gives your convenience but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Urbansurvivalguru

customer_reviews.title: Great Medic Bag. :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After reading the reviews on this, I was a little skeptical, but after receiving this product, I am blown away. I absolutely love it! You may need to add a little stuff to it, but it makes a great first-responder bag. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristie M

customer_reviews.title: Seams and stitching spit apart
customer_reviews.text: The bag and kit is what I was looking for, but unfortunately after only a few weeks the seams and stitching are splitting apart and in a way it is not posable to repair. Look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JT Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nurse Ratchet
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the person was totally blown away. It had everything a nurse Ratchet could use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag bad blood pressure cup
customer_reviews.text: The blood pressure cup has already broken and it's only been used 1 time. Except for a few additional items that I needed to stock the bag was a great buy. Just need to supply a better blood pressure cup.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great Item, great value for the items inside. I had to add some stuff but what med kit doesnt need stuff added?
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Full Stocked Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter kit for EMT(B) or POC FF. Well stocked great quality. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal, tons of extra space for more essentials. This bag is with me at all times and is now loaded with even more products to assist me in any situation.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: First Resonder Kit Fails Test
customer_reviews.text: This is a very disapointing First Responder Kit. It is smaller than what is presented and half of the bag is taken up by a Blodd Pressure Tester in a box. I work around Paramedics and this kit is a joke. Do not purchase. Also, the company will stick you with the return postage after you find out what a waste this kit is.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis D. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Some items are missing as of this date 09/24/13
customer_reviews.text: Some items missing/ swiss army knife, snake bite kit, tweezers, antibacterial ointment, staple remover, suture set, neuro hammer, epinephrine, peroxide . Please check if these are coming later! Cynthia Almeida
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Trauma Bag- Fully Stocked
customer_reviews.text: Nice big, heavy bag. You will have to add to this bag, but it`s a good start. Very happy with bag. Just throw it in the car and go you will always have everything you need on hand.
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: First Responder Bag/Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as a gift for someone just starting an EMT course. (This particular bag was on her birthday wish list!). It came very quickly (within 3 days) and I was a little nervous when I saw the box it shipped in...very flimsy and it looked a bit smashed. There was no additional protectve packing inside, but the product was fine. The bag looks great, all of the individual products inside are packaged well and need to be opened/organized by the recipient. Looks like a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Plenty of space for gear
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Plenty of space for gear. Comes with basic supplies but I added a few things like CATs and Nasopharyngeol airways and some QuikClot
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Products Missing
customer_reviews.text: Not everything was in the bag as stated in the advertisement. Very dissatisfied with item per the price. Unable to contact anyone to explain the procedure to complain. Thanks anyway...
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but the high school grad I gave it to was happy. He is training for EMS
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: your best bet
customer_reviews.text: Well stocked good space you may need to add a few things you want but after a lengthy search this was the best I found
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and picked this kit, I am Amazon prime so I got it quick. I am doing my first summer camp this coming weekend. All I can say is thanks the stars above I happened to really take a look at it. Over half the contents were missing. After printing a list I started taking inventory. I stopped seconds later. UNBELIEVABLE. If I would have just stowed this away and thought I had a first aid kit the results could have been disastrous. Really no joke that this could have ended badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon raffster

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my volly squad
customer_reviews.text: I'm a volunteer EMT and this bag was beyond my standards very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oles

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fully stocked, everything I expected and better the bag is strong and contents are quality and everything was there overall great bag
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great starter first aid bag
customer_reviews.text: This first aid bag was definitely more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: My son who was taking his emt course, loved this bag. Yes you do need to add a few things to it, but it is a great starter bag !
customer_reviews.author: Its a sweetheart

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This pack is amazing for the price. Exceeded my expectations. Bag itself is of pretty good quality also. Im buying another for work.
customer_reviews.author: Djan

customer_reviews.title: Medical Deal of the Year
customer_reviews.text: I am a firefighter/emt. i bought this kit to put in my own personal truck. Although it dosnt have everything i wanted, it had pretty much everything one would ever need in an emergency. I added a few things of my own because i know what i would like to have with me on an incident, I added: 2 cervical collars, burn jell, 1 aluminum splint, sergical and suture kit, oximeter, glucose meter, some more blood stoppers, more and different kinds of medi tape, additional sissors, breathalizer, more trauma pads, a variety of ib; asprin; tylonal, and a few other odds and ends. But the company was good to deal with, fast delivery and sell quality items. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: The Punisher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Trauma Bag Kit!
customer_reviews.text: As an LA County EMT, this product exceeded my expectations. Kit has everything in there and more for your BLS trauma needs.
customer_reviews.author: Vahe Zograbyan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag all in all but dividers are a pain in the rear to adjust and get set up.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything a first responder requires. It is lightweight and durable. I have not yet needed to use it, and I hope I never need to use it, but if I do need it, I will be well prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Al Sider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with this. He is an EMT.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: First aid
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very useful for the price. It includes anything you would need for basic to intermediate first aid and healthcare. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: good first aid bag.
customer_reviews.text: Came stocked with good product. Added quite a bit of my own supplies. All in all, a good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: DarqueRonin

customer_reviews.title: Trauma Bag and Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this Trauma bag just last week in the mail. I have to say that I am very impressed with it. When I got it, All the supplies in it were as explained on amazon.com. The only thing I had to add was an ambu bag. After that I had a first class trauma bag. I am very happy with this and would definatley recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good for patient care until EMS arrives. Great for the price. Would recommend to fire personal to keep in your personal vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: larry shibley

customer_reviews.title: good start
customer_reviews.text: good quality bag with padded dividers. lots of room. I have and will add to this, you will need too.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the money, need to add a few things but a descent start.
customer_reviews.author: jeff knight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag, ambulance ready kit. More of a BLS than "first aid" kit
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Good EMT Kit
customer_reviews.text: Good kit, but kinda on the cheap side. you will need more gloves and some band aids that stick better. Everything else in the kit is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Trauma Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely stocked trauma bag. I added other items, but it comes stocked with items for most emergencies. This is nice to have in trunk of vehicle or house in case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Canning

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it but didn't get what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag but got a different bag that was 60% less money than I paid for. Returned and did not re-order because I didn't want another mix up.
customer_reviews.author: Italo La Posta

customer_reviews.title: Excentent for bug out and add items to
customer_reviews.text: for the back of the car and for trips and bug outs
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: med go bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag for the price and every thing was in it like it said. great for home, car, or work
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: A good start
customer_reviews.text: The bag i received looks a little different, Its more of a red than orange, and with a blue Star or Life, which is okay with me, the one i got does not have removable velcro pockets... but im not going to send it back, It came stocked with lots of goods, the Stethoscope is on the very cheap side.. i guess you could say the same for the BP cuff. but its a 100$ kit, Deff need to add more to the kit, but its a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Caseyg

customer_reviews.title: Bag does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag in Feb 2012, and bag is fell a part from the inside out. All the rest of Items were great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is great quality! The bag is stocked with cheaper quality supplies though. They seemed a little old. overall worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke dumala

product_meta.title: Ever Ready First Aid Fully Stocked First Responder Kit, Orange
product_meta.description: Included In This Kit: 1 - First Responder Bag 1 - 12" x 30" Multi-Trauma Dressing 1 - Adult Blood Pressure Cuff 1 - Foil Baby Bunting 1 - Rappaport Type Sprague Stethoscope 1 - CPR Rescue Mask, Adult/Child Resuscitator In Hard Case Double Bandage Kit 10 - Alcohol Prep Pads 10 - Iodine Pads 2 - 2” x 5” Stretch Gauze Roll 2 - 3” x 5” Stretch Gauze Roll 2 - 6” x 5” Stretch Gauze Roll 16 - 4” x 4” 12 Ply Gauze Pad 6 - 5” x 9” Abdominal Combine Wound Pad 4 - Sooth A Sting Pad 4 - Non-Woven Triangular Bandage 20 - Ammonia Inhalant Ampules 4 - 1-⅝” x 2-⅝” Eye Pad 2 - 1” x 10” Surgical Cloth Tape 10 - 2” x 4-½” Adhesive Bandage 10 - Adhesive Knuckle Bandage 10 - Adhesive Finger Bandage 10 - 1” x 3” Adhesive Sheer Bandage 10 - ¾” x 3” Adhesive Plastic Bandage Tool Kit 1 - 5-½” Stainless Steel Bandage Scissor 1 - 5-½” Kelly Straight Forceps 1 - EMS Rescue Space Blanket 1 - Diagnostic Penlight With Pupil Gauge 1 - Padded Aluminum Wire Splint 1 - CPR Protector Mask In Plastic Bag 1 - Instant Cold Pack 1 - Seatbelt Cutter 1- Strawberry Glucose Gel 1 - Pair of Vinyl Exam Gloves 1 - One Hand Tourniquet 1 - Burnshield 4” x 4” Burn Dressing Pad 6 - Burnshield ⅛oz Burn Sachets 1 - Berman Emergency Airways Kit Set of 6 (40mm – 110mm)
feature_bullets: OUR LARGEST TRAUMA KIT - Featuring a extensive and generous assortment of tools and equipment packed in our largest trauma bag, this kit offers an unparalleled level of preparedness for almost any emergency.

FIRST RESPONDER BAG - An ideally sized 20" x 13" x 9" bag featuring a rubberized bottom panel, Velcro handle closures, three rows of elastic loops sewn into the lid, and reflective strips for added visibility. A removable padded liner with adjustable Velcro dividers can be used in any pattern to custom fit medical equipment in up to 10 padded compartments. Two generous exterior pockets with Velcro-attached removable pouches feature a clear vinyl see-through window and multiple elastic loops.
TOOL KIT - A collection of essential gear that no first aid kit should be without. Be prepared to treat a wide variety of injuries and emergencies with this collection of high quality equipment.
DOUBLE BANDAGE KIT - Includes two bandage kits. A wide variety of bandages and gauze that will help you treat a wide variety of cuts, scrapes, and lacerations.
ADDITIONAL TOOLS & EQUIPMENT - We've added more lifesaving and diagnostic tools and equipment to this kit, such as a dual tube stethoscope, blood pressure cuff, & adult/child CPR mask.
